nodes.text: The Heavy Destroyer was an aquatic repulsorcraft that saw service with the Imperial Navy during the Galactic Civil War. It utilized a pummel-based weapons system to combat other craft.

A successor to the Imperial Destroyer, the Heavy Destroyer shared the same clamshell design and short-range pummels as its predecessor, however it was more heavily armored and featured dual mounted pummels in place of the original single mount, providing a greater amount of power to use against enemy fleets.
Heavy Destroyers appear in the 2001 video game Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds and its 2002 expansion pack Clone Campaigns.
